page.title: 14Transport - Traffic Survey
page.content: A survey taken for 30 mins gave the following results. Cars Vans Lorries Motorbikes Others 73% 17% 7% 10% 2% The preponderance of cars is not particularly surprising when one considers that the school is in a residential area. Of the vans seen 80% had a clear domestic purpose. VEHICLE OWNERSHIP The dominance of the private car was confirmed in a survey of 200 households. 79% had 1 or more cars and of these 28% had 2 or more. 14% had more than 2 cars. Surprisingly these households had an average of 3 pedal bikes each, though none was seen in the traffic survey. From this it can be deduced that most are owned by children and used for weekend recreation.
